name: Behind The Case: Abandoned Facility [DEMO]
description: Welcome to the gripping world of Behind the Case, a new horror game that will keep you on the edge of your seat. In this game, you will be taken to a mysterious facility where strange and terrifying experiments have been conducted. As you delve deeper into the dark secrets of the facility, you will encounter strange creatures and face challenges that will test your resolve. Behind the Case will take you on a journey through this eerie world, giving you a taste of the horrors that await you. Join us as we launch the trailer for this thrilling horror game, and prepare yourself for the thrilling ride of your life. Are you ready to face your fears and uncover the truth behind the case?
